snippet: Online evaluations of the Harvard class taught by Matthew B. Platt reflect largely scathing opinions of the course. Nearly half of the 279 students enrolled in the spring class were accused of cheating.
lead_paragraph: Online evaluations of the Harvard class taught by Matthew B. Platt reflect largely scathing opinions of the course. Nearly half of the 279 students enrolled in the spring class were accused of cheating.

headline.main: Student Reviews of Introduction to Congress
